p: Oils with a similar smell can be obtained from other plant species, one of which is oleum Amyris balsamifera, from western India. This Western India sandalwood oil is produced on large Amyris balsamifera plantations and is less expensive than that obtained from Santalum album L. This Amyris balsamifera oil is an excellent natural mio-relaxant, i.e., a substance, which relaxes skeletal muscles due to the presence of high amounts of valerianol [ 1, 14, 15].
